de-DE.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Wählen Sie zwei Punkte auf der zu messenden Kurve.
Wählen Sie die Skizzenkurve des Auflagers.
de-DE.Measures the distance on a curve between: Misst den Abstand auf einer Kurve zwischen zwei angegebenen Punkten.
de-DE.Distance between 2 points on curve: Abstand zwischen 2 Punkten auf der Kurve

en-US.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Select two points on the curve to be measured.
Available only in sketch edit mode.
en-US.Measures the distance on a curve between: Measures the distance on a curve between two specified points.

es-ES.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Seleccione dos puntos de la curva a medir.
Seleccione la curva de croquis del apoyo.
Disponible sólo en modo de edición de croquis.
es-ES.Measures the distance on a curve between: Mide la distancia en una curva entre dos puntos especificados.
es-ES.Distance between 2 points on curve: Distancia entre 2 puntos de la curva

fr-FR.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Sélectionnez deux points sur la courbe à mesurer.
Sélectionnez la courbe d'esquisse du support.
Disponible uniquement en mode édition d'esquisse.
fr-FR.Measures the distance on a curve between: Mesure la distance sur une courbe entre deux points spécifiés.
fr-FR.Distance between 2 points on curve: Distance entre 2 points sur la courbe

it-IT.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Selezionare due punti sulla curva da misurare.
Selezionare la curva di schizzo del supporto.
Disponibile solo in modalità di modifica dello schizzo.
it-IT.Measures the distance on a curve between: Misura la distanza su una curva tra due punti specificati.

ja-JP.Select two points on the curve to be mea: 測定する曲線上の2点を選択。
サポートのスケッチの曲線を選択。
スケッチ編集時のみ利用出来ます。
ja-JP.Measures the distance on a curve between: 指定した2点間の曲線上での距離を測定します。

스케치 편집 모드에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.
ko-KR.Measures the distance on a curve between: 커브에서 지정된 두 점 사이의 거리를 측정합니다.

zh-CN.Select two points on the curve to be mea: 选择曲线上的两个点进行测量。
选择支持物的草图曲线。
仅在草图编辑模式下可用。
zh-CN.Measures the distance on a curve between: 测量曲线上两个指定点之间的距离。
zh-CN.Distance between 2 points on curve: 曲线上两点之间的距离

pl-PL.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Wybierz dwa punkty na krzywej, która ma zostać zmierzona.
Opcja dostępna tylko w trybie edycji szkicu.
pl-PL.Measures the distance on a curve between: Mierzy odległość na krzywej między dwoma określonymi punktami.

pt-BR.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Selecione dois pontos na curva a ser medida.
Selecione a curva de esboço do suporte.
Disponível somente no modo de edição de esboço.
pt-BR.Measures the distance on a curve between: Mede a distância em uma curva entre dois pontos especificados.

tr-TR.Select two points on the curve to be mea: Ölçülecek eğri üzerinde iki nokta seçin.
tr-TR.Measures the distance on a curve between: Bir eğri üzerinde belirtilen iki nokta arasındaki mesafeyi ölçer.
